name: cat-former
description:
OK think back to the 90s... and think back to movie licenced games of that sort of era. This is essentially a "Movie Licence" game for Extra History. if it was to continue it would enter other episodes (Style of background and enemy sprites would change thats all).

Controls:

Alt, Z, J - (A Button) Jump

Left / A - (Left Button) Move Left

Right / D - (Right Button) Move Right

Enter  - (Start Button) Start

The Goal is to collect the 3 cards on each level and make it to the end podium taking care not to touch any other characters.

BLURB: Zoey has lost her Magic Cards Deck and it has been transported back in time. Travel back in time and gather the cards. But Take Care not to change anything or get caught.

Cat Images from www.pexels.com

Source  code: https://github.com/fatrobin72/cat-former
